name: Neeharika
greetingText: We really like your name btw!
wishText: May all the joy you have spread around come back to you a hundredfold ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Neeharika!! Yee!! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what we were going to do.
text4: We realised, we wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special for the Team(Team Leader a.k.a captain of the ship)
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell us if you liked it.
replayText: Or reload the page, if you want to watch it again.
